app.title: Refactoring Racer
app.subtitle: Master Mac keyboard shortcuts through code challenges

start.description: Fix broken code using only keyboard shortcuts. No mouse or arrow keys allowed!
start.tip: Tip: Use Ctrl+Z to undo and Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo
start.modeTimeattackDesc: Solve as many as you can in 2 min
start.difficultyHint: Leave unselected to include all difficulties
start.categoryHint: Leave unselected to include all categories
start.languageHint: Leave unselected to include all languages

game.instructions: Fix the code to match the goal
game.pressToStart: Press any shortcut key to start the timer

result.title: Results
result.noWeakKeys: Great job! No weak areas found.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noData: No game data yet. Play some games first!

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.step1_desc: Move the cursor one character to the right. 'F' stands for Forward.
tutorial.step1_tip: Think of 'F' for Forward - moving forward through the text.
tutorial.step2_desc: Move the cursor one character to the left. 'B' stands for Backward.
tutorial.step2_tip: Think of 'B' for Backward - going back through the text.
tutorial.step3_desc: Jump to the beginning of the current line instantly.
tutorial.step3_tip: 'A' is the first letter of the alphabet - jump to the first position.
tutorial.step4_desc: Jump to the end of the current line instantly.
tutorial.step4_tip: 'E' for End - jump to the end of the line.
tutorial.step5_desc: Move the cursor down one line. 'N' stands for Next line.
tutorial.step5_tip: 'N' for Next line - move to the next line below.
tutorial.step6_desc: Move the cursor up one line. 'P' stands for Previous line.
tutorial.step6_tip: 'P' for Previous line - move to the line above.
tutorial.step7_desc: Delete everything from the cursor to the end of the line. The deleted text is saved for yanking.
tutorial.step7_tip: 'K' for Kill - cut the rest of the line. Use Ctrl+Y to paste it back!
tutorial.step8_desc: Delete the character to the left of the cursor, like Backspace.
tutorial.step8_tip: Ctrl+H works the same as Backspace but keeps your hands on the home row.
tutorial.step9_desc: Delete the character to the right of the cursor, like the Delete key.
tutorial.step9_tip: 'D' for Delete - remove the character ahead of the cursor.
tutorial.step10_desc: Paste the text that was last killed with Ctrl+K.
tutorial.step10_tip: 'Y' for Yank - pull back the text you killed. Works like paste for Ctrl+K.

custom.errorRequired: Title, initial content, and goal content are required.
custom.errorSameContent: Initial and goal content must be different.
